QuestData.Title: I Believe I Can Fly!
QuestData.Description: Let's not bother explaining how this happened, just know that I have the plan of all plans to escape this... this... <Looks over his hand-crafted outfit, then quickly glances to a pile of droppings nearby.>$B$BThis place stinks! But you can help!$B$BThese feathers here will help craft my escape plan. If you wouldn't mind, I'm sure there's enough for the both of us!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Molted Feathers for Snicarus Dungleflight.
